name: Tetris Remastered
description:
Fun story I copied the tetris theme into FL studio from a youtube vid months back and later got the great idea to remake Tetris.  Its Tetris but like less. Still in the works, planned features:

  • Hold and Next block feature
  • Scoreboard
  • Songs  to be added or changed
  • Improved movement
  • Poor Audio caused by Unity GL to be fixed
